boilerplate.organisms.Footer.license.mes: This project is licensed under the MIT license.
boilerplate.pages.FeaturePage.feedback.m: Enjoy the best DX and code your app at the speed of thought! Your saved changes to the CSS and JS are reflected instantaneously without refreshing the page. Preserve application state even when you update something in the underlying code!
boilerplate.pages.FeaturePage.internatio: Scalable apps need to support multiple languages, easily add and support multiple languages with `react-intl`.
boilerplate.pages.FeaturePage.javascript: Use template strings, object destructuring, arrow functions, JSX syntax and more, today.
boilerplate.pages.FeaturePage.network.me: The next frontier in performant web apps: availability without a network connection from the instant your users load the app.
boilerplate.pages.FeaturePage.routing.me: Write composable CSS that's co-located with your components for complete modularity. Unique generated class names keep the specificity low while eliminating style clashes. Ship only the styles that are on the page for the best performance.
boilerplate.pages.FeaturePage.scaffoldin: Automate the creation of components, containers, routes, selectors and sagas - and their tests - right from the CLI!
boilerplate.pages.FeaturePage.state_mana: Unidirectional data flow allows for change logging and time travel debugging.
boilerplate.pages.HomePage.start_project: Start your next react project in seconds
A highly scalable, offline-first foundation with the best DX and a focus on performance and best practices
